node.title: Jay-Z deletes his Instagram
node.description: He became the only person Beyonc√© followed. Now she follows nobody.
node.content: ["One day after Jay-Z made headlines for joining Instagram, the rapper and business mogul has seemingly deleted his account.", "Jay-Z, whose real name is Shawn Carter, joined the social media platform on Tuesday and gained 1.7 million by Wednesday morning. He also became the only person his wife, Beyonc\u00e9, followed \u2013 and only followed her in return.", "But fans typing \"Jay-Z\" into the Instagram search bar on Thursday will not find the rapper's account. After making just one post \u2013 promoting a Netflix movie he helped produce \u2013 he is gone.", "Fans turning to Beyonc\u00e9's page for clues won't find anything. She posted an image of herself and her husband on Wednesday \u2013 an ad for their \"About Love\" Tiffany & Co. campaign \u2013 but other than that there is no trace of Jay-Z's one-day Instagram account. She's back to following nobody.", "Jay-Z's net worth is $1.4 billion, according to\u00a0Forbes. His assets range from his entertainment company, Roc Nation, to a fine art collection that includes works by Jean-Michel Basquiat.\u00a0", "And in addition to his Armand de Brignac champagne and D'Uss\u00e9 cognac brands, he also produced a movie this year, \"The Harder They Fall,\" which is seemingly what he made his Instagram account to promote.", "Caitlin O'Kane is a digital content producer covering trending stories for CBS News and its good news brand, The Uplift."]
